item.title: Report X-2024072199
item.description:
Report X-2024072199

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-01T15:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-11
  • City: WEST COLUMBIA
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the CAER location a fiberboard box was discovered with a with powder spilling out. While investigating the shipment the agent discovered that the fire extinguisher inside the safety pin on the handle was not in placed and the gauge reads zero on the tank. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package.
